# alpha

**Instance Property**

The data copied to the fourth output channel.

## Declaration

```swift
var alpha: MTLTextureSwizzle
```

## Specifying swizzle values

- **red**: The data copied to the first output channel.
- **green**: The data copied to the second output channel.
- **blue**: The data copied to the third output channel.

items.description: The data copied to the first output channel.
items.name: red

items.description: The data copied to the second output channel.

items.description: The data copied to the third output channel.
